summary: אז מה היה לי השבוע (21-25.4)? - הפיגוע בסרי לנקה - חיים אתגר הוא מנחה יצאת צדיק (זה עוד קיים?) החדש - הבחירות באוקראינה - הגשם...
caption:
אז מה היה לי השבוע (21-25.4)?

- הפיגוע בסרי לנקה

- חיים אתגר הוא מנחה יצאת צדיק (זה עוד קיים?) החדש

- הבחירות באוקראינה

- הגשם שבגללו התבטל היום הראשון של היריד

- נסעתי לבקר את סבתא שלי שבקריות כדי לאחל לה חג שמח

- סיימתי עונה ראשונה של טוקיו גול

- היריד בנחלה, שהיה לטעמי אכזבה ושלא לדבר על יד ימין שנשרפה באותו יום :-/

- בר רפאלי הפסידה במשפט על העלמת המס

- סיימתי לעצב את הפאה של פוס מהוסקי נו קוני

- כנס עולמות

- קיבלתי את הקומישן שהזמנתי לקוספליי של פוס

- טל מן שוב אושפזה בשל סרטן

- אנדגיים יצא (ובבקשה בלי ספוילרים לידי!)

- אריאל קסלבסקי :(

- התחלתי את העונה האחרונה של משחקי הכס

- שביעי של חג

- הישראלית הסתומה שחרטה בקולוסיאום

ובנימה זו, הנני מודה לכל מי שהגיע לדוכנים השבוע. היה תענוג לראות את כל מי שבא ונתראה בכנסים הבאים :)

blog.description: bnha, sds, khnm, opm | wattpad: elluspaghettu | requests: closed

title: goodnight and thank you!
body:
i’m going to leave the requests there for tonight! keep leaving requests in my ask box though because i’ll be answering them tomorrow! the sooner you leave the request the faster the response is likely to come out.

thank you all so much for your support too! it means the absolute world to me to see that people like my headcanons, match ups and one shots. you’re all so so so sweet and leave such kind messages! <3

keep leaving requests my lovelies!

i do:

  • one shots
  • match-ups
  • headcanons
  • angst
  • fluff
  • fluff alphabet
  • character x reader
  • character x oc (need lots of detail in this so feel free to dm it to be rather than in my inbox if you prefer)

i don’t do:

  • smut/lemons
  • anything that makes me uncomfortable/i don’t feel is right for me to write about
  • character x character

lots of love,

ellu

p.s. shall i do a small q&a? feel free to leave any questions you have for me in my ask box/request box/whatever you want to call it!

blog.name: theenigmaofriversong
blog.title: The Long way round
blog.description: Clara sometimes asks me if I dream. Of course I dream, I tell her. Everybody dreams. But what do you dream about, she'll ask. The same thing everybody dreams about, I tell her. I dream about where I'm going. She always laughs at that. But you're not going anywhere, you're just wandering about. That's not true. Not any more. I have a new destination. My journey is the same as yours, the same as anyones. It's taken me so many years, so many lifetimes, but at last I know where I'm going. Where I've always been going. Home...

summary: I wonder if the Meta Liberation Army arc is gonna continue with a focus on leveling up the other members of the League like Toga...
body:
I wonder if the Meta Liberation Army arc is gonna continue with a focus on leveling up the other members of the League like Toga did.

Because if they do, and Dabi really is the third Todoroki brother, then it’s pretty clear how he would level up.

title: Bashing Boku no Hero: Introduction
body: I was a little late to the hype train for My Hero Academia, but when I finally got on it I kept up with regular updates of Kouhei Horikoshi’s hit manga series for about two years starting in 2016. At the time, I thought it was a really fun addition to the superhero genre with a fun, funky art style that threw in some cool ideas of constructing a world around super heroics. However, as the series progressed I began to notice a lot of flaws and tropes that prevented me from enjoying it the same way that I had in the earlier chapters and heralding the series as this iconic, genre-bending shounen title that a lot of people within the series’ fandom proclaimed that it was. Keep Reading

blog.name: ellusquirk
blog.title: hi i'm ellie
blog.description: bnha, sds, khnm, opm | wattpad: elluspaghettu | requests: closed

summary: Can you please write a headcanon about Izuku, Shoto, and Katsuki falling for a transfer student from a different country?
question: Can you please write a headcanon about Izuku, Shoto, and Katsuki falling for a transfer student from a different country?
answer:
the transfer student || headcanon

izuku midoriya

  • izuku had been looking forward to meeting you, the new transfer student, mainly because he wanted to learn about your quirk and put it into his hero journal.
  • but when he saw you he was blown away.
  • you were so damn gorgeous.
  • he couldn’t help but immediately feel incredibly flustered, and when you smiled, oh that smile, he was absolutely infatuated.
  • you became fast friends with uraraka, so it was natural that you sat with him, her and iida at lunchtime.
  • it was mainly comprised of you and uraraka talking about your home country, iida occasionally chipping it to ask about quirk training in your country and the occasional squeaked response whenever you asked izuku a question.
  • you thought he was adorable and told him so, and boy did he completely malfunction. uraraka freaked out when izuku fell of his chair and iida quickly marched him to recovery girl.
  • recovery girl knew what was up right away, and when you came to check up on izuku she didn’t hesitate to leave you two alone.
  • izuku really only gave one-word answers, kicking himself for being such an idiot when you finally left.
  • after a good few weeks a small practical test happened, the class being placed into pairs, and who was placed with you? none other than izuku.
  • you hadn’t stopped your attempts to make friends with him, and whenever you stepped too close he could barely even look you in the eye. he’d sweat a lot and turn the brightest shade of red you have ever seen but it didn’t deter you.
  • when he saw you use your quirk for the first time at its full power he was in awe and definitely pulled his journal out mid-battle so he could jot down some notes.
  • afterwards you asked him about it and the two of you spent the rest of the day together, izuku animatedly talking about various heroes he had written about in his journal and eventually working up the courage to ask you about your quirk so he can add you alongside them.
  • it didn’t take him long to realise that he was in love with you and he was incredibly flustered when he came to that realisation. whenever he was around you his heart went absolutely insane and he shook like a leaf from excitement. everything about you was so fascinating to him and he can’t help but want to know everything about you.

katsuki bakugou

  • he really could have cared less about the extra from another country.
  • for the first couple weeks you were there he barely even spared you a second glance, and got incredibly irritated whenever someone brought you up and praised you for your power and quirk.
  • it was only during the first practical test the class had where he was paired with that he finally paid you attention.
  • in typical bakugou style he told you stand back and let him do all the work.
  • but of course needed help - he couldn’t take on two of his classmates at once - and when you intervened he was shocked about how strong your quirk really was.
  • once the shock wore off he got really angry of course, but mainly to cover his awe.
  • after that he held immense respect for you and constantly challenged you.
  • you went along with his challenges a couple times and never held back on him, which he appreciated greatly.
  • once he finally got to know you he couldn’t deny that you were incredibly attractive and he really did think you were gorgeous.
  • whenever he was in the same room with you his heart would explode and he couldn’t think straight, and although he thought it was immensely annoying he didn’t attempt to try and deny his feelings.
  • he made a conscious effort to be around you more and whenever he could.
  • easily embarrassed around you for sure.
  • he gets teased a lot by the others over his very obvious crush.
  • he loves your smile and learning everything about you and your life abroad. he makes more of an effort with you than he does anyone else.

shouto todoroki

  • he too wasn’t really bothered about the transfer student, but he was interested to learn about your quirk and how powerful it was in comparison to his own.
  • he was low-key blow away by how gorgeous you were.
  • and whenever you talked to him his cheeks would flush the cutest pink ever.
  • you always made an effort to talk to him, and you never failed to make him smile.
  • he quickly realised that he was falling for you.
  • he’s absolutely fascinated about everything to do with you and spends a lot of time just listening to you talk about your life in your country.
  • you’re not shy about telling him he’s attractive, and he’s kind of taken aback by that, but he still loves your upfront nature.
  • but he definitely makes more of an effort to be around you and loves hearing about you.

written on 27/04/19. requests: open. match ups: open.

  • you always made an effort to talk to him, and you never failed to make him smile.
  • he quickly realised that he was falling for you.
  • he’s absolutely fascinated about everything to do with you and spends a lot of time just listening to you talk about your life in your country.
  • you’re not shy about telling him he’s attractive, and he’s kind of taken aback by that, but he still loves your upfront nature.
  • but he definitely makes more of an effort to be around you and loves hearing about you.

written on 27/04/19. requests: open. match ups: open.

trail.content_raw:
the transfer student || headcanon

izuku midoriya

  • izuku had been looking forward to meeting you, the new transfer student, mainly because he wanted to learn about your quirk and put it into his hero journal.
  • but when he saw you he was blown away.
  • you were so damn gorgeous.
  • he couldn’t help but immediately feel incredibly flustered, and when you smiled, oh that smile, he was absolutely infatuated.
  • you became fast friends with uraraka, so it was natural that you sat with him, her and iida at lunchtime.
  • it was mainly comprised of you and uraraka talking about your home country, iida occasionally chipping it to ask about quirk training in your country and the occasional squeaked response whenever you asked izuku a question.
  • you thought he was adorable and told him so, and boy did he completely malfunction. uraraka freaked out when izuku fell of his chair and iida quickly marched him to recovery girl.
  • recovery girl knew what was up right away, and when you came to check up on izuku she didn’t hesitate to leave you two alone.
  • izuku really only gave one-word answers, kicking himself for being such an idiot when you finally left.
  • after a good few weeks a small practical test happened, the class being placed into pairs, and who was placed with you? none other than izuku.
  • you hadn’t stopped your attempts to make friends with him, and whenever you stepped too close he could barely even look you in the eye. he’d sweat a lot and turn the brightest shade of red you have ever seen but it didn’t deter you.
  • when he saw you use your quirk for the first time at its full power he was in awe and definitely pulled his journal out mid-battle so he could jot down some notes.
  • afterwards you asked him about it and the two of you spent the rest of the day together, izuku animatedly talking about various heroes he had written about in his journal and eventually working up the courage to ask you about your quirk so he can add you alongside them.
  • it didn’t take him long to realise that he was in love with you and he was incredibly flustered when he came to that realisation. whenever he was around you his heart went absolutely insane and he shook like a leaf from excitement. everything about you was so fascinating to him and he can’t help but want to know everything about you.

katsuki bakugou

  • he really could have cared less about the extra from another country.
  • for the first couple weeks you were there he barely even spared you a second glance, and got incredibly irritated whenever someone brought you up and praised you for your power and quirk.
  • it was only during the first practical test the class had where he was paired with that he finally paid you attention.
  • in typical bakugou style he told you stand back and let him do all the work.
  • but of course needed help - he couldn’t take on two of his classmates at once - and when you intervened he was shocked about how strong your quirk really was.
  • once the shock wore off he got really angry of course, but mainly to cover his awe.
  • after that he held immense respect for you and constantly challenged you.
  • you went along with his challenges a couple times and never held back on him, which he appreciated greatly.
  • once he finally got to know you he couldn’t deny that you were incredibly attractive and he really did think you were gorgeous.
  • whenever he was in the same room with you his heart would explode and he couldn’t think straight, and although he thought it was immensely annoying he didn’t attempt to try and deny his feelings.
  • he made a conscious effort to be around you more and whenever he could.
  • easily embarrassed around you for sure.
  • he gets teased a lot by the others over his very obvious crush.
  • he loves your smile and learning everything about you and your life abroad. he makes more of an effort with you than he does anyone else.

shouto todoroki

  • he too wasn’t really bothered about the transfer student, but he was interested to learn about your quirk and how powerful it was in comparison to his own.
  • he was low-key blow away by how gorgeous you were.
  • and whenever you talked to him his cheeks would flush the cutest pink ever.
  • you always made an effort to talk to him, and you never failed to make him smile.
  • he quickly realised that he was falling for you.
  • he’s absolutely fascinated about everything to do with you and spends a lot of time just listening to you talk about your life in your country.
  • you’re not shy about telling him he’s attractive, and he’s kind of taken aback by that, but he still loves your upfront nature.
  • but he definitely makes more of an effort to be around you and loves hearing about you.

written on 27/04/19. requests: open. match ups: open.

tags: do not try this at home
summary:
Interviewer: wow you have so many scars on you. You must be a wild one on the battlefield.
Bakugou: or stupid.
Kaminari: I...
body:
This is pro hero Chargeblot breaking down the history of his injuries and no one can change my mind.

Interviewer: wow you have so many scars on you. You must be a wild one on the battlefield.

Bakugou: or stupid.

Kaminari: I prefer the very experimental term better.

Interviewer: so how did you get that one on the side of your head?

Kaminari: oh this one…

Mina: we have fottage… Of all of them.

(if you’re not familiar with jackass don’t play the video 😂)

Blog created April 2, 2019. No fics before this date will be archived.
This page is still under construction

title: Changing Times
description:
by nmatthews

The world has mostly settled down following the appearance of quirks many years ago. Now a new phenomenon, secondary genders, threatens this relative peace. The students of UA are forced to navigate the difficulties of being teenagers and aspiring heroes - all while society struggles to adapt and accept this new reality.

Words: 1277, Chapters: 1/10, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/F, F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Midoriya Izuku, Bakugou Katsuki, Yagi Toshinori | All Might, Midoriya Inko, Midoriya Hisashi, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead, Yamada Hizashi | Present Mic, Todoroki Shouto, Iida Tenya, Bakugou Mitsuki, Bakugou Masaru, Kirishima Eijirou, Ashido Mina, Uraraka Ochako
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku
  • Additional Tags: Alpha/Beta/Omega Dynamics, High School, Post-Canon, Cute Midoriya Izuku, Alpha Bakugou Katsuki, Bakugou Katsuki is Bad at Feelings, Misunderstandings, Lack of Communication, Pining Midoriya Izuku, Angry Bakugou Katsuki, Villains, Characters Are Pro Heroes (My Hero Academia), Other Additional Tags to Be Added
